casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwarn Lee ROGERS 63A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 7, 2017 Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, Wyatt Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Rogers, Antwarn Lee. Heather H. Freeman, Assistant Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of April 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of April 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 15th day of May 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
